issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I put this statement in a try block

calendar = Ti.Android.Calendar.allCalendars; 

it returns nullPointerException , if clicked 2 or 3 times

<android version: 2.1>

comments.body:
hz

In order for us to progress this issue, please edit your ticket to include a proper [use-case|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-CreatingGoodUsecases].

Include the complete log, containing the exception.

State what you have tested it on - ie emulator or device.

Add the environment information that you have omitted, and move any related information to the environment field.

Please also check the [Jira Ticket Checklist|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-Summary%3AJiraTicketChecklist] for any other information that may be missing. 

It's important that you read the whole section on [Submitting Bug Reports|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-SubmittingBugReports], before you consider raising a ticket.

Thank you in advance
I'm closing this due to no response. If you are able to provide the missing information, then you are welcome to reopen. Thanks
